Name: Portal Journey: Portarius
About the game: Portarius - is a game where players must solve physical puzzles and challenges by opening portals to maneuvering objects, and themselves, through space while making their ways to the center of the Earth. Key features: Three chapters each with its own challenges and atmosphere Portals make every journey unique Artful and lush 2D graphics Compete against other players on the global leader-board Realistic physics Great soundtrack
